messages.title: BUILDING A BRIGHTER FUTURE FOR LEEDS NORTH WEST
messages.content: Kamran Hussain is fighting to STOP BREXIT

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Kamran Hussain and the Liberal Democrats are committed to stopping Brexit in all circumstances. They are the only major party to the remain party.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY THE LIBERAL DEMOCRATS CAN BEAT LABOUR

issues.brexitEurope: This election is about Brexit and Kamran Hussain is leading the charge to Stop Brexit in our area. A vote for the Lib Dems is a vote for no more Brexit. It means we can get on with building a fair economy, so families aren't forced to rely on foodbanks. It will mean long-overdue action on the local communities need.

leaflet.personalStatement: Kamran Hussain Is fighting to STOP BREXIT

politicalExperience.role: Chair of the Yorkshire and Humber Lib Dems, hard working local solicitor

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet compares Kamran Hussain with Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party, making the case that voting for the Liberal Democrats is a vote to stop Brexit and that they are the only capable party of defeating Labour in the constituency.
